sentences.en: Haig's message was that victory was ripe for picking.

sentences.en: He left a message saying he would probably be a little late.
sentences.cn: 他留言说可能会晚一点来。

sentences.en: His message was aimed at the undecided middle ground of Israeli politics.
sentences.cn: 他所传达的信息针对的是以色列政局中尚未表态的中间派。

sentences.en: I think they got the message that this is wrong.

sentences.en: It’s perfectly possible to get your message across (= communicate what you want to say ) without being so angry.
sentences.cn: 就算不这么生气，你也完全可以把意思说清楚。

sentences.en: Mr. Speaker, our message to the president is simple.

sentences.cn: 我的主人命令我务必私下里传递消息。
